channel.title: meta on Emma's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in meta on Emma's Blog

item.title: Hello, Hugo
item.description: Medium has gone downhill sharply since I first published some blogs on their platform 5 years ago. It’s been irritating to me as a reader of other blogs to be pushed to login or subscribe or whatever, and I don’t want my content used like that. So, I’ve finally sorted out my own blog - using Hugo & GitHub Pages. Farewell, Medium.
